GSD.description:
ath11k: disable spectral scan during spectral deinit

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit 60afa4f4e1350c876d8a061182a70c224de275dd. For more details please see the references link.
